name: songs-assignment
description: Songs management application with NestJS backend and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: npm run db:up && npm run backend:setup && npm run backend:dev
scripts.db:up: docker-compose up -d && echo '‚è≥ Waiting for database to be ready...' && sleep 3
scripts.backend:setup: cd backend && npm install && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx prisma generate && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npm run start:dev
scripts.backend:start: cd backend && npx dotenv -e ../.env -- npm run start:prod
